Tucson had never worked with a convoy but he sensed that this time it was b=
est to follow.  With a nod of agreement he follows Big Convoy willingly. 

=
" All right, I'll follow.  Your plan seems to work better than my version. =
 Let's hope Rhinox isn't too far gone.  It would be a shame to have lost hi=
m.  I've heard many good things about Rhinox and I will do everything in my=
 power to rescue him."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
